title: HTMLTable Colspan & Rowspan

metadata.description: Learn about HTMLTable Colspan & Rowspan with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
HTML tables can have cells that span over multiple rows and/or columns. NAME APRIL 2022 FIESTA HTML Table - Colspan To make a cell span over multiple columns, use the colspan attribute: Example
Name Age
Jill Smith 43
Eve Jackson 57
Note: The value of the colspan attribute represents the number of columns to span. HTML Table - Rowspan To make a cell span over multiple rows, use the rowspan attribute: Example
Name Jill
Phone 555-1234
555-8745
Note: The value of the rowspan attribute represents the number of rows to span. ★ +1
